title: Fully employed resources for economy on PPF

content.prompt: Which of the following is always true of an economy operating on its production possibilities frontier?

choices.label: It cannot trade with other nations because it is the most efficient producer of tradeable goods.
It will necessarily operate on the same frontier the following year.
